TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRow extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 中的資料列。

span.span: Represents a row of data in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和物件為主要元件。The and objects are primary components of a . 使用物件及其屬性和方法來擷取和評估; 以及插入、 刪除和更新中的值。Use the object and its properties and methods to retrieve and evaluate; and insert, delete, and update the values in the . 代表實際中的物件，而包含描述的結構描述物件。The represents the actual objects in the , and the contains the objects that describe the schema of the . 使用多載屬性來傳回或設定值。Use the overloaded property to return or set the value of a . 使用和屬性來判斷特定資料列的值、 狀態和屬性來決定相對於其父資料列狀態。Use the and properties to determine the status of a particular row value, and the property to determine the state of the row relative to its parent . 若要建立新，使用方法物件。To create a new , use the method of the object. 之後建立新，使用方法，將新至。After creating a new , use the method to add the new to the . 最後，呼叫方法確認新增的物件。Finally, call the method of the object to confirm the addition. 如需有關將資料加入至，請參閱[將資料加入至 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md)。For more information about adding data to a , see [Adding Data to a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable.md). 您可以刪除從藉由呼叫方法，或藉由呼叫方法物件。You can delete a from the by calling the method of the , or by calling the method of the object. 方法從集合中移除資料列。The method removes the row from the collection. 相反地，標記移除。In contrast, marks the for removal. 當您呼叫時，就會發生實際移除方法。The actual removal occurs when you call method. 藉由呼叫，您可以透過程式設計方式檢查哪些資料列標示為實際刪除它們之前移除。By calling , you can programmatically check which rows are marked for removal before actually deleting them. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[刪除 DataRow](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md)。For more information, see [DataRow Deletion](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datarow-deletion.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立新藉由呼叫方法物件。The following example creates a new by calling the method of the object. span.span: Commits all the changes made to this row since the last time was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 叫用時、方法會隱含地呼叫來結束所有的編輯。When invoking , the method is implicitly called to end any edits. 如果的資料列已加入或修改會變成未變更。If the of the row was Added or Modified, the becomes Unchanged. 如果已刪除，並移除資料列。If the was Deleted, the row is removed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。See the method for more information. 類別也有方法，這會影響到整份資料表所做的變更。The class also has an method which affects changes made to the whole table. 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例示範如何接受或拒絕個別的資料列的變更，請參閱[AcceptChanges 和 RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md)。For more information and a code example that demonstrates how to accept and reject changes to individual data rows, see [AcceptChanges and RejectChanges](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/acceptchanges-and-rejectchanges.md). ## Examples 下列範例會先建立新包含一個資料行，然後建立單一。The following example first creates a new with one column, and then creates a single . 做為是建立、 新增、 修改和刪除，其列印。As the is created, added, modified, and deleted, its is printed. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.AcceptChanges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Sub BeginEdit ()
public: void BeginEdit();

summary.span: 在 物件上開始編輯作業。

span.span: Starts an edit operation on a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法將進入編輯模式。Use the method to put a into edit mode. 在此模式中，事件會暫時停用，讓使用者對多個資料列中的變更，而不觸發驗證規則。In this mode, events are temporarily suspended, letting the user make changes to more than one row without triggering validation rules. 例如，如果您必須確定之資料行的總金額的值等於付款的值，而且資料行的資料列中的信用額度，您可以將每個資料列放進入編輯模式，暫停的資料列的值驗證，直到使用者嘗試認可的值。For example, if you must make sure that the value of the column for a total amount is equal to the values for the debit and credit columns in a row, you can put each row into edit mode to suspend the validation of the row values until the user tries to commit the values. 方法會隱含呼叫，當使用者變更控制項的值繫結的資料;方法會隱含呼叫，當您叫用方法物件。The method is called implicitly when the user changes the value of a data-bound control; the method is called implicitly when you invoke the method for the object. 在此編輯模式時，建議的值會儲存原始和新的表示法。While in this edit mode, the stores representations of the original and new proposed values. 因此，只要不呼叫方法，您可以擷取的原始或建議的版本並傳遞`DataRowVersion.Original`或`DataRowVersion.Proposed`如`version`參數屬性。Therefore, as long as the method has not been called, you can retrieve either the original or proposed version by passing either `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed` for the `version` parameter of the property. 您也可以藉由叫用來取消任何編輯動作，此時方法。You can also cancel any edits at this point by invoking the method. 若要查看的資料列是否包含的原始或建議值，呼叫方法。To see if the row contains an original or proposed value, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法暫停事件，但`delete`作業並不會。The method temporarily suspends events, but the `delete` operation does not. ## Examples 此範例會建立簡單與一個和五個物件，和。The example creates a simple with one and five objects, and a . A事件處理常式也會加入至監視資料列的值變更時。A event handler is also added to monitor when the row's value is changing. 叫用後在現有的資料列，條件約束和事件都會暫時停用，原始和建議值會列印。After invoking on the existing rows, the constraint and event are temporarily disabled and the original and proposed values are printed. 再次叫用來將兩個資料列設定為相同的值。The is again invoked to set two rows to the same value. 當呼叫時，在相同的值會強制執行。When is called, the is enforced on the identical values. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRow.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您只可以建立或更新的資料列之後您呼叫,方法; 同樣地，方法必須呼叫以認可編輯。You can only create or update a row after you call the method; similarly, the method must be called to commit the edit. 在您呼叫後方法，並在呼叫之前方法時，原始的和新的內部表示建議的值會儲存。After you call the method, and before you call the method, internal representations of the original and new proposed values are stored. 因此，直到您呼叫，您可以使用`version`引數來指定哪個版本的資料行的值需要請`DataRowVersion.Original`或`DataRowVersion.Proposed`。Therefore, until you call the , you can use the `version` argument to specify which version of a column's value you need, either the `DataRowVersion.Original` or `DataRowVersion.Proposed`. 不過，一旦您呼叫方法中，資料行的版本會還原為`DataRowVersion.Original`。However, as soon as you call the method, the version of the column reverts to `DataRowVersion.Original`. 如果新的資料列，您也可以傳遞`DataRowVersion.Default`參數來擷取資料行的預設值。If the row is new, you can also pass `DataRowVersion.Default` for the parameter to retrieve the column's default value. 傳遞時`DataRowVersion.Current`，屬性會傳回目前的值，無論其可能版本。When passing `DataRowVersion.Current`, the property returns the current value, whatever its version may be. > [!NOTE] > 當您變更資料繫結控制項的值或隱含地呼叫方法物件加入至;方法會隱含呼叫，當您呼叫下列方法： 方法的物件方法物件，或方法。The method is called implicitly when you change the value of a data-bound control or when a object is added to the ; the method is called implicitly when you call the following methods: the method of the object, the method of the object, or the method. 相反地，列舉`Current`傳回後的資料版本呼叫方法。By contrast, the enumeration `Current` returns the version of the data after the method has been called. `version`引數不應與混淆屬性。The `version` argument should not be confused with the property. `version`引數描述相對於資料行的原始值的資料行所包含之資料的狀態。The `version` argument describes the state of the data that is contained by the column relative to the column's original value. 屬性描述的整個資料列，相對於其父狀態。The property describes the state of the whole row relative to its parent . 如果發生例外狀況中，當您設定此屬性時，會產生例外狀況事件。When you set the property, an exception is generated if an exception occurs in the event. 如果這是即時的編輯，請參閱可以產生的例外狀況。If this is an immediate edit, see for the exceptions that can be generated. ## Examples 下列範例會取得透過資料行的目前值屬性物件。The following example gets the current value of a column through the property of the object.
